document.full_text: boeing co  said it would fight a national labor relations board complaint originally lodged by one of its labor unions that challenges the aircraft maker's 2009 decision to establish a second assembly line in south carolina for the 787 dreamliner.
document.title: boeing vows to fight complaint over second 787 plant
lines_and_colors: boeing co  said it would fight a national labor relations board complaint originally lodged by one of its labor unions that challenges the aircraft maker's 2009 decision to establish a second assembly line in south carolina for the 787 dreamliner.
